# NSScroller.Part.incrementLine

**Case**

Down or right by a small amount.

## Declaration

```swift
case incrementLine
```

## Constants

- **NSScroller.Part.knob**: Directly to the scroller’s value, as given by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSControl/floatValue].
- **NSScroller.Part.knobSlot**: Directly to the scroller’s value, as given by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSControl/floatValue].
- **NSScroller.Part.decrementLine**: Up or left by a small amount.
- **NSScroller.Part.decrementPage**: Up or left by a large amount.
- **NSScroller.Part.incrementPage**: Down or right by a large amount.
- **NSScroller.Part.noPart**: Don’t scroll at all.
